thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Atos Signs Contract With European Space Agency To Enable Services With Satellite Data

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Atos Signs Contract With European Space Agency To Enable Services With Satellite Data
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - ATOS:
* SIGNS KEY CONTRACT WITH EUROPEAN SPACE AGENCY TO ENABLE NEW SERVICES WITH SATELLITE DATA
* ‍SELECTED BY ESA TO DELIVER AND OPERATE COPERNICUS DATA AND INFORMATION ACCESS SERVICES​
* TO BE RESPONSIBLE FOR INTEGRATING, DELIVERING AND OPERATING CLOUD PLATFORM, INTEGRATING SPECIALIZED DATA SOURCES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
